00020 #include "system/system.h"

00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 bool debug_crash = false;
00025 
00026 bool in_cspcomp_for_failexit = false;
00027 
00028 void D_FATAL_ERROR2(string s, string file, string line)
00029 { 
00030   cerr << "Sorry, there has been some kind of error." << endl;
00031   cerr << "This could be caused by a misformed input file, or by an internal bug." << endl;
00032   cerr << "If you can't figure out what is causing the problem, please report it at http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/minion." << endl;
00033   cerr << "Either on the bug tracker, or on the mailing list." << endl;
00034   cerr << endl;
00035   cerr << "The generated error message was: " << s << endl;
00036   cerr << "The error was in the file " << file << " on line " << line << endl;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void _NORETURN FAIL_EXIT(string s) 
00040 { 
00041   if(in_cspcomp_for_failexit)
00042   {
00043     if(s != "")
00044       cout << "c " << s << endl;
00045     cout << "s UNKNOWN" << endl;  
00046     exit(1);
00047   }
00048   
00049   cerr << "Unrecoverable error. Exiting." << endl;
00050   cerr << s << endl;
00051   cerr.flush();
00052   if(debug_crash)
00053   { 
00054     int* i = NULL;
00055     *i = 0;
00056   }
00057   throw 9;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void assert_function(BOOL x, const char* a, const char* f, int line)
00061 { 
00062   if(!x) 
00063   {
00064     cerr << "Assert Error!" << endl;
00065     cerr << "Test '" << a << "' failed." << endl;
00066     cerr << "In file " << f << ", line " << line << endl;
00067     cerr << "\n";
00068     cout << "\n";
00069     cout.flush();
00070     cerr.flush();
00071     FAIL_EXIT();
00072   }
00073 }
